transcripts.text: Hello and welcome back people.  My name is Reza Afshar.  This is Chris Bridgen.  Wow, this is part one of our new year, 2020, of all the calamities that are happening around the world.  So what is going on?

Seven people have been killed in a landslide in northeastern Brazil.  Local authorities say the group had been gathering for Christmas celebrations when the landslide occurred.  Firefighters pulled five bodies from the debris, while sniffer dogs had to be used to find two additional bodies.  Three others were injured in the incident.
